backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining profile, messaging, posts, stories, and reels data types, mixins, and state with access-controlled profile retrieval.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for major frontend files across pages, components, hooks, and tools.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document loading fonts, favicon, and bootstrapping the React app.
frontend/src/ai/chatbotRules.ts: Simple rules-based chatbot that responds to keywords and can navigate to valid routes.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, profile setup gating, and route definitions for all app sections.
frontend/src/components/ai/AiWritingTool: Local text transformation tool allowing tone selection, output preview, copying, and download.
frontend/src/components/ai/ImageGenerato: Canvas-based generator creating gradient backgrounds with random circles, adjustable via hue and complexity sliders, with PNG export.
Local chatbot UI that stores messages, processes input through chatbotRules, and can trigger navigation actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header showing logo and logout button, clearing identity and React Query cache on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapping header, navigation sidebar, and routed content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNaviga: Sidebar navigation listing app sections with icons and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Displays a post's author, timestamp, caption, and optional image using card UI components.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal form for creating a user profile with display name, username, and bio, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/study/SlidesTool: Simple slide editor with add, delete, reorder, edit, and presentation mode functionality.
frontend/src/components/study/Whiteboard: Canvas-based whiteboard supporting drawing, erasing, clearing, and exporting as PNG.
frontend/src/games/2048/Game2048.tsx: Implements a playable 2048 game with board initialization, movement/merge logic, scoring, and UI controls.
frontend/src/games/memory-match/MemoryMa: Creates a memory matching game using emoji pairs with flip logic, match detection, move counting, and reset functionality.
frontend/src/games/quiz/Quiz.tsx: Provides a multi‑question quiz with answer selection, scoring, progress navigation, and result display.
frontend/src/games/snake/Snake.tsx: Implements a Snake game with movement, food spawning, collision detection, scoring, and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/games/tic-tac-toe/TicTacToe: Builds a tic‑tac‑toe game including turn handling, winner detection, and board reset.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useChat.ts: Defines hooks to fetch and send chat messages via an actor with react‑query caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Provides hooks to load and save the current user profile through the actor with query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePosts.ts: Contains hooks to fetch posts and create new posts using the backend actor and react‑query updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useReels.ts: Offers hooks for retrieving and creating video reels with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStories.ts: Implements hooks to get active stories and create new ones, syncing via react‑query.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useUserSearch: Adds a search hook that queries usernames based on input text through the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation of the backend actor based on user identity and triggers dependent query invalidation on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, handling login, stored identity loading, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/music/library.ts: Exports a simple music track interface and a small demo track list.
frontend/src/pages/AiToolsPage.tsx: Renders a tabbed UI for AI tools including writing, image generation, and a chatbot.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Implements a chat interface allowing users to send and view messages with a selected principal ID.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays a feed of posts and provides a form to create posts with optional image uploads and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/GamesPage.tsx: Provides a tabbed interface to play various built-in games like Tic-Tac-Toe, Memory, Snake, 2048, and Quiz.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Renders a login screen prompting users to sign in using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/pages/MusicPage.tsx: Music library page with filtering, audio playback controls, and track navigation logic.
frontend/src/pages/ReelsPage.tsx: Reels page enabling reel creation via form inputs and displaying existing reels with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: User search page that queries usernames and allows starting a chat with selected results.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Stories page supporting text/image story creation and rendering active stories with timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/StudyToolsPage.tsx: Study tools page providing tabbed access to a whiteboard and slides components.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters with hash support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the social app's overall state, requirements, features, and image assets needed for development. Includes authentication, feed, chat, stories, reels, and auxiliary tool requirements plus architectural notes.
